message.body: Okay. Nope, have to revise my résumé. Not sure about the language thing. If that's what they're looking for, I'm kind of screwed. I don't know how impressed they'll be with my fulfillment of my Spanish prerequisite.
It's okay, Sam. Good luck on it

Well you also have Vietnamese, which you can say you're fluent in. Don't worry, I don't think we have any Vietnamese projects. But both that and your Spanish will show you have some grasp on basic language skills.
But you could also just be put on the video annotation task, which doesn't have anything to do with language.
I'll just warn you that I think that project's coming to an end, and so they might not even be hiring for it.
Did the job posting say anything in particular? Where did you find it?
It's for video annotations ( sounds similar to what you did). It's on a Penn student employment website.
Hmm... I wonder if you can do it if its on the Penn student website
